meanings.meaning: This involves the oxygen sensor upstream the catalytic converter on Bank 2. This code indicates the engine air fuel ratio is not being adjusted by the oxygen sensor signal or the ECM as expected to do so, or not adjusted as often as expected to do so once the engine is warmed or under normal engine use.

causes.cause: The wiring to the sensor is broken / frayed

descriptions.description: Oxygen Sensor Circuit Slow Response (Bank2, Sensor1)

solutions.solution: Check and fix any exhaust leaks
Check for a deteriorating / contaminated oxygen sensor, replace if necessary
Check for wiring problems (shorted, frayed wires)
Check the frequency and amplitude of the oxygen sensor (advanced)
Check the MAF sensor for proper operation
Replace the Bank 2 oxygen sensor upstream of the catalytic converter

symptoms.symptom: You will likely not notice any drivability problems, although there may be symptoms.
